removed_externally: This device is no longer available in your Nest account
unauthenticated: Authentication has been revoked, go to Settings > Nest to re-authenticate
version_repair: Due to a major update, this device needs to be re-paired

settings.title: Nest Settings
settings.login_intro: Click here to login with your Nest account.

authentication.not_authorized: Please login with your Nest Account
authentication.re-authorize: Please re-authorize through the Nest App Settings
authentication.device_not_found: Device could not be found, try logging in again with the right Nest account.
authentication.re-login_failed: Something went wrong when logging in.
authentication.re-login_failed_with_error: Something went wrong when logging in (error: __error__)

api.retry: Something went wrong, try again later.
api.error_get_authenticated_state: Could not get current login state (error: __error___)

error.not_streaming: (__name__) Failed to fetch snapshot, device is not streaming
error.hvac_mode_is_heat_cool: (__name__) Failed to set target temperature to __temp__, can not adjust when HVAC mode is heat-cool
error.hvac_mode_is_eco: (__name__) Failed to set target temperature to __temp__, can not adjust when HVAC mode is Eco
error.temp_lock: (__name__) Failed to set target temperature to __temp__, can not adjust temperature outside temperature lock (__min__ - __max__)
error.emergency_heat: (__name__) Failed to set target temperature to __temp__, can not adjust when using emergency heat
error.hvac_emergency_heat: (__name__) Failed to set HVAC mode, can not adjust when using emergency heat
error.hvac_mode_heat-cool_unsupported: (__name__) HVAC mode heating and cooling is unsupported
error.camera_permission: The Nest client you are using does not allow for adding Nest Cams to Homey. Check the Nest smartphone app for a message asking you to accept a client update. After accepting you should login again via Settings > Nest.
error.set_away_permission: The Nest client you are using does not allow for changing the Away mode. Check the Nest smartphone app for a message asking you to accept a client update. After accepting you should login again via Settings > Nest.
error.unknown: (__name__) Failed to set target temperature to __temp__, error: __error__
